column4: Question: I recently installed ubuntu8.10 on my Lenovo s10e netbook and I've found that many windows are below the bottom panel. Its very inconvenient. The resolution is 1024x576. is there a way to get set the windows to show completely al the time?
Umm, well, using a setup designed for the screen size is nice. The Ubuntu Notebook Remix is satisfactory.
That's part of using GNOME. I had the same problem on a screen with two very large panels once. There's nothing you can do except use the keyboard & take a short in the dark (tab+enter)
